item.title: Zakra Main - Services section with Icons
item.dc:creator: teamthemegrill
item.content:encoded:
Why Choose Zakra

Some Awesome features of Zakra

AMP ready

Construction is our main work. We can construct anything imaginable except for the ladder to heaven. Need help? We are just a call away.

Elementor Compatible

Construction is our main work. We can construct anything imaginable except for the ladder to heaven. Need help? We are just a call away.

Gutenberg Compatible

Construction is our main work. We can construct anything imaginable except for the ladder to heaven. Need help? We are just a call away.

GDPR Complaint

Construction is our main work. We can construct anything imaginable except for the ladder to heaven. Need help? We are just a call away.

item.content:encoded:

Choose the pricing Right for you

item.title: Zakra Main - Front Page

item.content:encoded:
We are ThemeGrill

Zakra invites you to build your next site

LEARN MORE VIEW FEATURES

Why Choose Zakra

Some Awesome features of Zakra

AMP ready

Construction is our main work. We can construct anything imaginable except for the ladder to heaven. Need help? We are just a call away.

Elementor Compatible

Construction is our main work. We can construct anything imaginable except for the ladder to heaven. Need help? We are just a call away.

Gutenberg Compatible

Construction is our main work. We can construct anything imaginable except for the ladder to heaven. Need help? We are just a call away.

GDPR Complaint

Construction is our main work. We can construct anything imaginable except for the ladder to heaven. Need help? We are just a call away.

Important Pages

Pages to get you started Right Away

Services

Drag & Drop Page Builder

Know our team, engineers, architects behind our construction team. We are people that find passion in what we do.

Contact Us

Integrated Contact Form

Know our team, engineers, architects behind our construction team. We are people that find passion in what we do.

Awesome Support

Dedicated Free Support

Know our team, engineers, architects behind our construction team. We are people that find passion in what we do.

Plans & Pricing

Choose the pricing Right for you

Basic

$20

per month

  • Upto 10 Interior Objects
  • 1 Year Repair Coverage
  • Upto 4000 sq. feet
Buy Now

per month

per month

item.title: Zakra Main - Testimonials section
item.dc:creator: teamthemegrill
item.content:encoded:
Testimonials

Hear what they have to say about Us!

"I really like their work, I guess now they have got a new lifetime customer. From now on, every construction project that I do will only be via their construction company." Maria Swartzki Manager, R & B Group "I really like their work, I guess now they have got a new lifetime customer. From now on, every construction project that I do will only be via their construction company." Teresa Henry Manager, R & B Group "I really like their work, I guess now they have got a new lifetime customer. From now on, every construction project that I do will only be via their construction company." Martina Henks Manager, R & B Group

item.title: Zakra Main - About page
item.dc:creator: teamthemegrill
item.content:encoded:
Introduction

Our backGroud Story

We started our journey in 2012. And looking back it has been an awesome ride with lots of ups and downs. But whatever be the situation, we were always trying to move forward.

Icing croissant croissant jelly gummi bears cotton candy jujubes apple pie caramels. Dragée soufflé bonbon powder. Sesame snaps sugar plum chupa chups tart wafer caramels toffee.

Founding Members

Meet Core Team Behind Us

CEO

Kiya Kramaric

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Marketing Head

Maria Shimfera

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Content Head

Isika Rostova

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Project Manager

Maya Zukostia

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

item.title: Zakra Main V2 - About Intro Section
item.dc:creator: teamthemegrill
item.content:encoded:
Introduction

Our backGroud Story

We started our journey in 2012. And looking back it has been an awesome ride with lots of ups and downs. But whatever be the situation, we were always trying to move forward.

Icing croissant croissant jelly gummi bears cotton candy jujubes apple pie caramels. Dragée soufflé bonbon powder. Sesame snaps sugar plum chupa chups tart wafer caramels toffee.

item.title: Home

item.content:encoded:
We are ThemeGrill

Zakra invites you to build your next site

LEARN MORE VIEW FEATURES

Why Choose Zakra

Some Awesome features of Zakra

AMP ready

Construction is our main work. We can construct anything imaginable except for the ladder to heaven. Need help? We are just a call away.

Elementor Compatible

Construction is our main work. We can construct anything imaginable except for the ladder to heaven. Need help? We are just a call away.

Gutenberg Compatible

Construction is our main work. We can construct anything imaginable except for the ladder to heaven. Need help? We are just a call away.

GDPR Complaint

Construction is our main work. We can construct anything imaginable except for the ladder to heaven. Need help? We are just a call away.

Important Pages

Pages to get you started Right Away

Services

Drag & Drop Page Builder

Know our team, engineers, architects behind our construction team. We are people that find passion in what we do.

Contact Us

Integrated Contact Form

Know our team, engineers, architects behind our construction team. We are people that find passion in what we do.

Awesome Support

Dedicated Free Support

Know our team, engineers, architects behind our construction team. We are people that find passion in what we do.

Plans & Pricing

Choose the pricing Right for you

Basic

$20

per month
  • Small to Mid House
  • Upto 10 Interior Objects
  • 1 Year Repair Coverage
  • Upto 4000 sq. feet
Buy Now

Standard

$40

per month
  • Small to Mid House
  • Upto 10 Interior Objects
  • 1 Year Repair Coverage
  • Upto 4000 sq. feet
Buy Now

Professional

$60

per month
  • Small to Mid House
  • Upto 10 Interior Objects
  • 1 Year Repair Coverage
  • Upto 4000 sq. feet
Buy Now

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: teamthemegrill
item.content:encoded:
Introduction

Our backGroud Story

We started our journey in 2012. And looking back it has been an awesome ride with lots of ups and downs. But whatever be the situation, we were always trying to move forward.

Icing croissant croissant jelly gummi bears cotton candy jujubes apple pie caramels. Dragée soufflé bonbon powder. Sesame snaps sugar plum chupa chups tart wafer caramels toffee.

Founding Members

Meet Core Team Behind Us

CEO

Kiya Kramaric

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Marketing Head

Maria Shimfera

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Content Head

Isika Rostova

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

Project Manager

Maya Zukostia

Facebook Twitter Google-plus

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: teamthemegrill
item.content:encoded: Welcome to ThemeGrill Demo. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: teamthemegrill
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
